directions: Combine frozen vegetables, potatoes, onion, celery, tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, and onion soup mix, mix well. Cover and cook over medium low heat, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 hours.
Serve hot with cold evaporated milk, if desired.
ingredients: 3 pounds potatoes - peeled, boiled and diced
2 (14.5 ounce) cans peeled and diced tomatoes
2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix
title: Friday Night Veggie Soup
